You're quite adept at both tuning in and tuning out.
Your mind tends to wander a bit, and you can end up getting lost in your own thoughts.
You might end up getting distracted, forgetting something, or missing things.
However, when you're able to tune out the world and focus on something, you focus on it a LOT.
You can hunker down and become super productive, finishing something in record time that you'd never expect to.
It's quite hard to predict which side you'll end up on on any given day.
A spacey person like you will be...
